This document describe how to produce text labels.

This document illustrate how to use color in WHeatmap.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
## library(devtools)
## load_all('~/tools/wheatmap/wheatmap')
```

```{r prepare}
library(wheatmap)
```


```{r}
a <- WHeatmap(matrix(1:16,nrow=4), name='a', cmp=CMPar(dmin=1, dmax=32)) + WHeatmap(matrix(17:32, nrow=4), LeftOf(), name='b', cmp=CMPar(dmin=1,dmax=32))
```

```{r}
a + WLabel('Dinosaur', TopOf('a', pad=0.02), fontsize = 30)
```
